verses.verse: I <S%G1492>saw<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> coming <S%G2597>down<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G2807>key<s%> of the <S%G12>abyss<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G254>chain<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G2902>seized<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon,<s%> the <S%G744>old<s%> <S%G3789>serpent,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4567>Satan,<s%> who deceives the whole inhabited <S%G2532>earth,<s%> and <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> for a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G12>abyss,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2808>shut<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G2808><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2808>sealed<s%> it <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he should <S%G4105>deceive<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G2089>more,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> were <S%G5055>finished.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G5023>this,<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> must <S%G1163>be<s%> <S%G3089>freed<s%> for a <S%G3398>short<s%> <S%G5550>time.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2362>thrones,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2917>judgment<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G846>them.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I saw the <S%G5590>souls<s%> of those who had been <S%G3990>beheaded<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3748>such<s%> <S%G4352>as<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1504>image,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G5480>mark<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3359>forehead<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5495>hand.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G2198>lived,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G936>reigned<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> for a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G326>live<s%> <S%G326><s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> were <S%G5055>finished.<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> is the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G386>resurrection.<s%>

<S%G3107>Blessed<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> is he who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G386>resurrection.<s%> <S%G1909>Over<s%> <S%G5130>these,<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1849>power,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> they will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G2409>priests<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> one <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> he will come <S%G1831>out<s%> to <S%G4105>deceive<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> which <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G1137>corners<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G1136>Gog<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3098>Magog,<s%> to <S%G4863>gather<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G4171>war;<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> is <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G285>sand<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G4114>breadth<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2944>surrounded<s%> the <S%G3925>camp<s%> of the <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G2944><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G25>beloved<s%> <S%G4172>city.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4442>Fire<s%> came <S%G2597>down<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2719>devoured<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G1228>devil<s%> who <S%G4105>deceived<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> was <S%G906>thrown<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2303>sulfur,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the false <S%G5578>prophet<s%> are <S%G2532>also.<s%> They will be <S%G928>tormented<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> him who <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3772>heaven<s%> fled <S%G5343>away.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> There was <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> for <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3398>small,<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2316>throne,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G455>opened<s%> <S%G975>books.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G243>Another<s%> <S%G975>book<s%> was <S%G455>opened,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the book of <S%G2222>life.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3498>dead<s%> were <S%G2919>judged<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> which were <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G975>books,<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2041>works.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G2281>sea<s%> gave <S%G1325>up<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> who were <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>it.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2288>Death<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G86>Hades<s%> gave <S%G1325>up<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> who were <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> They were <S%G2919>judged,<s%> each <S%G1538>one<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>works.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2288>Death<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G86>Hades<s%> were <S%G906>thrown<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G4442>fire.<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> the lake of fire.

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2147>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> he was <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G4442>fire.<s%>
